imdb.title: Sansha san'yô
imdb.plot: Futaba, Teru, and Youko prove that it can take even the smallest connection to form a friendship. But that doesn't mean it'll be easy!

episodes.title: These Are Bread Crusts
episodes.plot: Yoko Nishikawa is a former rich girl struggling to understand her new reduced circumstances. The loneliness is getting to be too much when carefree glutton Futaba Odagiri and scary class rep No-First-Name Hayama crash into her life and change everything.

episodes.title: Nothing Good for You Is Tasty
episodes.plot: Yoko, Futaba, and Hayama learn more about each other as they continue to eat lunch together. They encounter a rival, a sibling, and cats. All the while,Yoko is deciding whether Hayama is kind-hearted or black-hearted.

episodes.title: A Taste of Maid
episodes.plot: Yoko and Futaba are in a pinch and need to find part-time jobs to earn money. Along the way, the three girls meet Shino Sonobe, Yoko's eccentric former maid.

episodes.title: Actually, This Is What I Live For
episodes.plot: Yoko, Futaba, and Hayama learn about each others' hobbies and childhoods. They also encounter Yu and Sakura, who stir up a little trouble.

episodes.title: Your Birthmarks Have Faded
episodes.plot: An accident temporarily puts Yoko out of commission, so Futaba and Hayama help out at the patisserie. While Miss Sonobe is certainly grateful for the help, she won't stop until she's acquired one more part-time employee.

episodes.title: Veggies, Meat, Meat, Meat, Meat, Meat, Meat, and Fish
episodes.plot: It's time for the beach! Yoko, Futaba, and Hayama help out Sonobe at her beach hut.

episodes.title: Ten Yen Short
episodes.plot: Fall is here, and we meet two siblings who seem to hate Futaba for no reason. Who are they, and why do they have something against her?

episodes.title: You've Got Them Hooked
episodes.plot: Hayama goes to a cat cafe with her sister and sees Nishiyama there! Futaba has a free ticket for the petting zoo. Then, Futaba wants to start up a band.

episodes.title: Curry Tastes Better on the Second Day
episodes.plot: The school is having its cultural festival. Hayama and Futaba's class is doing a curry shop, and Miss Yoko's class will be doing some haunting!

episodes.title: A Day to Gorge on Chicken and Cake
episodes.plot: It's Christmas and it also happens to be someone's birthday. Then, the end of the year approaches, and it's almost New Year's. How will Hayama, Futaba, and Yoko celebrate these holidays?

episodes.title: A Day to Gorge on Chocolate
episodes.plot: Join Yoko, Hayama, and Futaba as they prepare for and celebrate Valentine's Day.

episodes.title: I Am Graduating from Bread Crusts
episodes.plot: It starts as a normal day for Yoko, but everybody is acting strange! What has gotten into them?!
